name: MealsMenu
0:
”Alexa, ask Meals Menu what's for supper”
”Alexa, ask Meals Menu what's for breakfast tomorrow”
”Alexa, ask Meals Menu what are we eating on Saturday”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: meals menu
des:
Read planned meals from your personal Meals Menu Google Sheet. The Meals Menu Google sheet contains a weekly menu in an easily editable format.

This skill is easy to use but requires a little bit of setup using a desktop computer web browser to create a Google sheet before it can be used. Setup is slightly technical in nature but step-by-step instructions are available here: tinyurl.com/mealsmenu (or go directly to: https://github.com/dkrahmer/MealsMenuAlexaSkill/wiki)

This skill is completely FREE with NO upgrades or annoying messages begging you to pay money. This is my personal project that I am sharing with the world for free.

If you need assistance, find a bug, or have a feature suggestion please post to the Meals Menu Reddit forum: https://www.reddit.com/r/MealsMenuAlexaSkill/

Enjoy! :)

-Doug Krahmer
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
